results.snippet: That being said, I had a GREAT experience finding a storm... In the Battle of the Big Box Hardware Store, Lowe's has always come out on top for me, the orange one down the street a little lower on the list. I've come to rely on Lowe's for do-it-yourself... I visited four garden centers last week two were locally owned and two were big box stores. One was this Lowe's.
